articles.title: Could Trump investigation stop him running for President in 2024? - RNZ
articles.description: The dramatic FBI search of Donald Trump's Florida home marks a sudden escalation of investigations into the former president, and posed new legal questions that could alter the course of the American presidency.
articles.content:
